attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: alcohol is a major issue within the uk, over recent years their has been an increase in binge drinking, alcoholism, and under-age drinking. These adverts are only glorifying the substance and encourage the problems they bring with it. Just like tobacco was banned because of the health implementations alcohol should also as not only does it cause the anti-social behaviours above but also has many serious health implementations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
